title: Montopolis duplex by neighborhood rec & community center
posting_body: Say hello to this gorgeous and newly constructed 3 bed, 2.5 bath Montopolis duplex on Austin’s vibrant east side!
Inside, there’s a bright and open floor plan that’s bathed in natural light, hardwood floors, and recessed lighting, along with a chef-worthy kitchen.
Beautiful quartz counters, a mosaic backsplash, and stainless steel appliances will elevate your dinner parties and weekend brunches.
Plus, a dishwasher will help with the clean-up.
Two levels give you lots of space to relax and entertain at this pet-friendly duplex.
You’ll also have air conditioning, an in-unit washer/dryer, parking, and a spacious, fenced backyard for weekend BBQs!
This prime Montopolis location is only minutes from downtown Austin and popular outdoor attractions.
Get downtown after a short five-mile drive, or spend the day closer to home at the Secret Beach and the Colorado River Park.
The Montopolis Recreation & Community Center is across the street for sports courts, a gym, a pool, and more.
This spot also boasts easy access to hiking trails, parks, shopping, and dining.
Grab groceries right nearby at a couple of neighborhood markets, or make the short drive to H-E-B Plus, Whole Foods Market, or Target Grocery.
De Nada Cantina, Sawyer & Co, Javi’s Best of Tex Mex, and 1618 Asian Fusion are all within a couple of miles too!
